verses.verse: Now it happened in the thirtieth <S%H7970><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> month, <S%H2568><s%> in the fifth of the month, <S%H2320><s%> as I was among <S%H8432><s%> the captives <S%H1473><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar, <S%H3529><s%> that the heavens <S%H8064><s%> were opened, <S%H6605><s%> and I saw <S%H7200><s%> visions <S%H4759><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>
In the fifth <S%H2568><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> which was the fifth <S%H2549><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Jehoiachin <S%H3112><s%>'s captivity, <S%H1546><s%>

the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came expressly to Ezekiel <S%H3168><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Buzi, <S%H941><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> Chebar; <S%H3529><s%> and the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Yahweh was there on him. <S%H3068><s%>

I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H7307><s%> a stormy wind came <S%H935><s%> out of the north, <S%H6828><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> cloud, <S%H6051><s%> with flashing <S%H784><s%> lightning, <S%H3947><s%> and a brightness <S%H5051><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it, <S%H8432><s%> and out of its midst as it were glowing <S%H5869><s%> metal, <S%H2830><s%> out of the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire. <S%H784><s%>

Out of its midst <S%H8432><s%> came the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of four <S%H702><s%> living creatures. <S%H2416><s%> This was their appearance: <S%H4758><s%> they <S%H2007><s%> had the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of a man. <S%H120><s%>
Everyone <S%H259><s%> had four <S%H702><s%> faces, <S%H6440><s%> and each one <S%H259><s%> of them had four <S%H702><s%> wings. <S%H3671><s%>

Their feet <S%H7272><s%> were straight <S%H3477><s%> feet; <S%H7272><s%> and the sole <S%H3709><s%> of their feet <S%H7272><s%> was like the sole <S%H3709><s%> of a calf <S%H5695><s%>'s foot; <S%H7272><s%> and they sparkled <S%H5340><s%> like <S%H5869><s%> burnished <S%H7044><s%> brass. <S%H5178><s%>

They had the hands <S%H3027><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> under their wings <S%H3671><s%> on their four <S%H702><s%> sides; <S%H7253><s%> and the four <S%H702><s%> of them had their faces <S%H6440><s%> and their wings thus: <S%H3671><s%>

their wings <S%H3671><s%> were joined <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another; <S%H269><s%> they didn't <S%H5437><s%> turn when they went; <S%H3212><s%> each one <S%H376><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> straight <S%H5676><s%> forward. <S%H6440><s%>

As for the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of their faces, <S%H6440><s%> they had the face <S%H6440><s%> of a man; <S%H120><s%> and the four <S%H702><s%> of them had the face <S%H6440><s%> of a lion <S%H738><s%> on the right side; <S%H3225><s%> and the four <S%H702><s%> of them had the face <S%H6440><s%> of an ox <S%H7794><s%> on the left side; <S%H8040><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> of them also had the face <S%H6440><s%> of an eagle. <S%H5404><s%>

Such were their faces. <S%H6440><s%> Their wings <S%H3671><s%> were spread <S%H6504><s%> out above. <S%H4605><s%> Two <S%H8147><s%> wings of each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> touched <S%H2266><s%> another, <S%H376><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> their bodies. <S%H1472><s%>

Each one <S%H376><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> straight <S%H5676><s%> forward: <S%H6440><s%> where the spirit <S%H7307><s%> was to go, <S%H3212><s%> they went; <S%H3212><s%> they didn't <S%H5437><s%> turn when they went. <S%H3212><s%>

As for the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the living creatures, <S%H2416><s%> their appearance <S%H4758><s%> was like burning <S%H1197><s%> coals <S%H1513><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of torches: <S%H3940><s%> the fire went up and down <S%H1980><s%> among the living creatures; <S%H2416><s%> and the fire <S%H784><s%> was bright, <S%H5051><s%> and out of the fire <S%H784><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> lightning. <S%H1300><s%>
The living creatures <S%H2416><s%> ran <S%H7519><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a flash of lightning. <S%H965><s%>

Now as I saw <S%H7200><s%> the living creatures, <S%H2416><s%> behold, <S%H259><s%> one wheel <S%H212><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the living creatures, <S%H2416><s%> for each of the four <S%H702><s%> faces of it. <S%H6440><s%>

The appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the wheels <S%H212><s%> and their work <S%H4639><s%> was like <S%H5869><s%> a beryl: <S%H8658><s%> and the four <S%H702><s%> of them had one <S%H259><s%> likeness; <S%H1823><s%> and their appearance <S%H4758><s%> and their work <S%H4639><s%> was as it were a wheel <S%H212><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> a wheel. <S%H212><s%>
When they went, <S%H3212><s%> they went <S%H3212><s%> in their four <S%H702><s%> directions: <S%H7253><s%> they didn't <S%H5437><s%> turn when they went. <S%H3212><s%>

As for their rims, <S%H1354><s%> they were high <S%H1363><s%> and dreadful; <S%H3374><s%> and the four <S%H702><s%> of them had their rims <S%H1354><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of eyes <S%H5869><s%> all around. <S%H5439><s%>

When the living creatures <S%H2416><s%> went, <S%H3212><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> beside them; <S%H681><s%> and when the living creatures <S%H2416><s%> were lifted up <S%H5375><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> were lifted up. <S%H5375><s%>

Wherever the spirit <S%H7307><s%> was to go, <S%H3212><s%> they went; <S%H3212><s%> there was the spirit <S%H7307><s%> to go: <S%H3212><s%> and the wheels <S%H212><s%> were lifted up <S%H5375><s%> beside <S%H5980><s%> them; <S%H7307><s%> for the spirit of the living creature <S%H2416><s%> was in the wheels. <S%H212><s%>

When those went, <S%H3212><s%> these went; <S%H3212><s%> and when those stood, <S%H5975><s%> these stood; <S%H5975><s%> and when those were lifted up <S%H5375><s%> from the earth, <S%H776><s%> the wheels <S%H212><s%> were lifted up <S%H5375><s%> beside <S%H5980><s%> them: <S%H7307><s%> for the spirit of the living creature <S%H2416><s%> was in the wheels. <S%H212><s%>

Over the head <S%H7218><s%> of the living creature <S%H2416><s%> there was the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of an expanse, <S%H7549><s%> like <S%H5869><s%> the awesome <S%H3372><s%> crystal <S%H7140><s%> to look on, <S%H5186><s%> stretched forth over their heads <S%H7218><s%> above. <S%H4605><s%>

Under the expanse <S%H7549><s%> were their wings <S%H3671><s%> straight, <S%H3477><s%> the one <S%H802><s%> toward the other: <S%H269><s%> each one <S%H376><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> which covered <S%H3680><s%> on this side, <S%H2007><s%> and every one <S%H376><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> which covered <S%H3680><s%> on that side, <S%H2007><s%> their bodies. <S%H1472><s%>

When they went, <S%H3212><s%> I heard <S%H8085><s%> the noise <S%H6963><s%> of their wings <S%H3671><s%> like the noise <S%H6963><s%> of great <S%H7227><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> like the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Almighty, <S%H7706><s%> a noise <S%H6963><s%> of tumult <S%H1999><s%> like the noise <S%H6963><s%> of an army: <S%H4264><s%> when they stood, <S%H5975><s%> they let down <S%H7503><s%> their wings. <S%H3671><s%>
There was a voice <S%H6963><s%> above the expanse <S%H7549><s%> that was over their heads: <S%H7218><s%> when they stood, <S%H5975><s%> they let down <S%H7503><s%> their wings. <S%H3671><s%>

Above <S%H4605><s%> the expanse <S%H7549><s%> that was over their heads <S%H7218><s%> was the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of a throne, <S%H3678><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a sapphire <S%H5601><s%> stone; <S%H68><s%> and on the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the throne <S%H3678><s%> was a likeness <S%H1823><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%> on it above. <S%H4605><s%>

I saw <S%H7200><s%> as it were glowing <S%H5869><s%> metal, <S%H2830><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> within <S%H1004><s%> it all around, <S%H5439><s%> from the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of his waist <S%H4975><s%> and upward; <S%H4605><s%> and from the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of his waist <S%H4975><s%> and downward <S%H4295><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> as it were the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> and there was brightness <S%H5051><s%> around him. <S%H5439><s%>

As the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the rainbow <S%H7198><s%> that is in the cloud <S%H6051><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of rain, <S%H1653><s%> so was the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the brightness <S%H5051><s%> all around. <S%H5439><s%> This was the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of the likeness <S%H1823><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> When I saw <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H5307><s%> I fell on my face, <S%H6440><s%> and I heard <S%H8085><s%> a voice <S%H6963><s%> of one that spoke. <S%H1696><s%>
